name: Revenge
description:
"Is it just me, or is it getting crazier out there?" - Arthur Fleck, Joker (2019)

Inspired by one of the most popular movies "Joker" by Todd Phillips.

3D animations, visuals effects, music it was all done by me.

I made the scene in cinema 4D + Octane render and add some VFX and colors adjustment in After Effects. The music also was written and made by me.
